about_the_game:
Largescale Warfare is a first-person and third-person shooter that is set slightly in the future, ongoing wars between nations has split the world in half. You will battle it out in large 32 player games set around the world, From deep forests to white out snow bases. They'll be plenty of weapons to choose from and a large supply fo vehicles.

Teamdeath Match
This original and well loved gamemode will make up most of the battling you'll do on Largescale Warfare, With two teams fighting over who gets the most kills.

Conquest large
This gamemode will be added in the near future, Where two teams will fight to capture points on the map, Controlling teams will bleed tickets from the other team in order to win the game, Vehicles and large scale maps will make up this gamemode.

Deathmatch
Built on smaller maps where you'll fight it out in 16 player free for all. Most kills will win the game when the timer drops to zero.

Please note that Largescale Warfare is in early access, Everything is subject to change!

content_descriptors.notes: Blood, Guns and Death are used in this game to simulate war.
